effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.

short_effect.sun_moon: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.
